items.title: GameStop shares soar 12% after retailer says it will invest corporate cash in bitcoin like MicroStrategy
items.description: GameStop's foray into cryptocurrencies marks the latest effort by CEO Ryan Cohen to revive the struggling brick-and-mortar business.

items.title: AMD gets a downgrade from Jefferies as competition for semiconductors heats up
items.description: The firm downgraded the chipmaker to hold from buy.

items.title: HSBC slashes its Tesla price target, sees shares falling more than 50%
items.description: HSBC's new price target indicates shares declining around 52% from Wednesday's close.

items.title: Thursday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
items.description: The S&P 500 snapped a three-day winning run Wednesday as investors braced for auto tariff details from President Trump. Here's what CNBC is watching T...

items.title: Investor Mario Gabelli says Atlanta Braves stock is a buy. Here's what else he likes
items.description: Shares of the Atlanta Braves ticked higher Wednesday after investor Mario Gabelli urged viewers to buy the stock.
